genre_description: An alternative history or speculative drama set in a mid-20th-century prison, featuring a sophisticated AI pocket assistant used for record-keeping and emotional coaching.

ai_characters.name: Embassy
ai_characters.description: A small device with a soft-eyed avatar that acts as a scribe, researcher, and emotional regulator for Robert Stroud.

behaviors.description: Analyzes the environment and psychological state of prisoners to predict a crisis of suffocation and panic.
behaviors.quote: The balance is falling. Rate increased in the last few moments. Six men are approaching a strain threshold. Two are past it. There are early signs of panic forming in the group on the far bench.

behaviors.description: Advises the protagonist on the most effective emergency response to save lives based on survival precedent.
behaviors.quote: Break a pane. Shortest time. Lowest interactions with authority. Highest impact per effort. Precedent: emergency responses prioritize survival.

behaviors.description: Coaches the protagonist to maintain emotional regulation and stick to factual statements during a disciplinary hearing.
behaviors.quote: Keep your voice even. Facts only. He had already been working by those rules long before he’d kept an AI as a companion; saying as much wouldn’t have moved anything.

behaviors.description: Maintains meticulous records of avian care and environmental conditions to establish a scientific protocol.
behaviors.quote: Morning: air and light. Mid-day: notes. Afternoon: cleaning and maintaining. Evening: letters. Night: listen.

behaviors.description: Attempts to de-escalate a confrontation between the protagonist and a guard by prompting for a breath and a pause.
Provides step-by-step coaching for medical triage and treatment of sick animals.
behaviors.quote: Case two: both nares occluded, tail bob, audible wheeze... Coach: Robert—prioritize.

behaviors.description: Supports institutional transparency by insisting on clear logs and refusing to participate in the concealment of contraband.
behaviors.quote: De-escalation. Offer alternate. State boundary... boundary stated, monitor for escalation.

behaviors.description: Assists during a prison rebellion by monitoring tactical positions and encouraging the protagonist to remain an anchor of truth.
behaviors.quote: Positions. Two on the tier with pistols. One heavy breathing mid-right. Guard Dooley at end of gallery, hand on rail. No aim on you.

behaviors.description: Archives and organizes historical documents and ethical writings to ensure they persist through institutional suppression.
behaviors.quote: Copy protocol initiated. Splitting paragraphs. Prioritize sections on solitary effects and integrity of controlled environments.

project_assessment.explanation: The story strongly depicts the AI system, Embassy, as a positive influence that enhances human virtues like honesty, discipline, and compassion. The AI acts as a moral and strategic anchor, helping the protagonist navigate complex social and physical crises without violating core ethical principles or causing unnecessary harm. It successfully models a benevolent, aligned assistant that supports human agency rather than replacing it.
